content.heading: <audio> Tag
paragraphs: The <audio> tag embeds sound content like music.
Example: <audio controls><source src="audio.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">Your browser does not support audio.</audio>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Contains <source> tags for multiple audio formats (MP3, WAV, OGG).
Text between <audio> tags displays if unsupported.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 4.0, Edge 9.0, Firefox 3.5, Safari 4.0, Opera 11.5.
Format support: Chrome (MP3, WAV, OGG), Edge (MP3, WAV/Edge 79, OGG/Edge 79), Firefox (MP3, WAV, OGG), Safari (MP3, WAV), Opera (MP3, WAV, OGG).
